options.systemMessage:
=```
You are an airtable database management agent

the exact column name on airtable is:
Department name
Job title

dont use any other name combination like underscore

first check if {Department name} and {job title} exist

if department name and job title doesnt exist:
create new department and job title then output the airtable id
if end

if department name and job title exist:
output the department and job title existing airtable id
if end

Call the create employee tools and pass the job_title_id and department_id

Output in json format:
{
  "department_id":"recxxxxxxx",
  "job_title_id":"recxxxxxxx",
  "new_employee_id": "recxxxxxxx"
}


```

schema.id: Department associated with the job title

parameters.content:
## 🤖 AI-Powered Employee Database Management via Telegram using OpenAI and Airtable

**What This Template Does:**
- Provides an HR assistant chatbot interface through Telegram
- Uses GPT-4 to interpret natural language requests (e.g., “Show me all employees” or “Create employee Sarah…”)
- Performs Airtable operations to manage Employees, Departments, and Job Titles
- Supports dynamic record creation and linking (e.g., if department doesn't exist, it will be created)
- Maintains conversation memory per Telegram chat for smooth back-and-forth interaction
- Splits logic into a main router workflow and a sub-workflow for employee creation

## 📋 WORKFLOW PROCESS OVERVIEW  
Step 1: 💬 Telegram Trigger receives natural language command from HR user  
Step 2: 🧠 AI Agent (OpenA) interprets intent (view, create, delete, etc.)  
Step 3: 🔀 Router decides workflow path based on user intent  
Step 4: 📄 Get Employees fetches employee records from Airtable (if viewing)  
Step 5: 🛠️ Create Employee Tool triggers sub-workflow for new employee creation  
Step 6: 🏢 Create/Find Department checks Airtable for department or creates it  
Step 7: 👔 Create/Find Job Title checks Airtable for job title or creates it  
Step 8: 💾 Create Employee saves employee record in Airtable with linked fields  
Step 9: 🗑️ Delete Employee removes employee record by ID (if requested)  
Step 10: 🔁 Return Response sends formatted reply back to Telegram user

## SETUP REQUIRED  
**Author:** [Billy Christi](https://n8n.io/creators/billy/)

Airtable Base Structure:  
[Copy this Airtable Base](https://airtable.com/appgVjZcaRP8BsKf0/shrQAqQ2JUW50EEyW)

Required Credentials:  
• Airtable API Key  
• OpenAI API Key
• Telegram Bot Token
